channel.title: [317] Chat Colour and Something else
channel.description:
I need the colours to change like when u ::yell it should look ur name yellow or something like that and also the crowns of mod and admin if possible.
If there is anyways to change the normal chat color to like white plz help me out xD
Thanks

item.title: [317] Chat Colour and Something else
item.dc:creator: @Rasmux Rasmux
item.description:
@Rasmux wrote:

deathschaos9:

Yes, its very easy to add it if your client supports color change… just add @whi@ into ur yell command not 100% sure where bcuz i havnt seen ur command

Where where? xD

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String titles = “”;

if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = "[Moderator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = "[Administrator] ";
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[CO-OWNER] ";
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Rasmux”)) {
titles = “[>>[OWNER]<<]-”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

[quote=“xlxoxoxt, post:5, topic:277428”]@whi@
@yel@
@blu@

Do you see a pattern?[/quote]

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Chat Colour and Something else
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:277428”]Yes, its very easy to add it if your client supports color change… just add @whi@ into ur yell command not 100% sure where bcuz i havnt seen ur command[/quote]He’s right. But unless your server has an official client and it isn’t connectable with any other It’s not recomended.
